result.eng: I love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.
result.ga: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairte
result.orig: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairte
result.html: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairteI love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.
result.ponchtml: Tá grá agam do ḋroiċid aċ níorḃ é seo fáṫ mo ċuairteI love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.

result.eng: Don't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ga: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.orig: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.html: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ponchtml: Ná ṫaḃair grá do ċroí ċoíċe do ṁnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
